mapper.select: SELECT cntyy, sidocd, sidonm, tagar, sbfmcnt, pcycnt, objcnt, round(sbam/1000000,0) sbam, sbar, asbrt, round(prms/1000000,0) prms, round(govprm/1000000,0) govprm, round(sidoprm/1000000,0) sidoprm, round(sggprm/1000000) sggprm, round(fmprm/1000000) fmprm, round(rfas/1000000) rfas, round(govrfa/1000000) govrfa, round(sidorfa/1000000) sidorfa, round(sggrfa/1000000) sggrfa, round(fmrfa/1000000) fmrfa, round(rfprm/1000000) rfprm, rffmcnt, round(riskprm/1000000) riskprm, round(grsprm/1000000) grsprm, prmrt, rfcnt, rfrt, round(prmpp/1000) prmpp, acdcnt, round(idm/1000000) idm, idmpa, acdrt, losrt FROM status1 WHERE 1=1
